question:
Which among the following is the benefit of Automotive Mission Plan (AMP) 2016-26 to Indian economy?
1. Contribution of auto industry in the country’s GDP will rise to over 12 per cent.
2. Around 65 million incremental number of direct and indirect jobs will be created.
3. End of life Policy will be implemented for old vehicles.
Choose the correct option from the choices given below:
explanation:
The Automotive Mission Plan (AMP) 2016-26 aims to enhace the contribution of autonotive sector. The following are the benefits Automotive Mission Plan (AMP) 2016-26 to Indian economy:
1. Contribution of auto industry in the country’s GDP will rise to over 12 per cent.
2. Around 65 million incremental number of direct and indirect jobs will be created.
3. End of life Policy will be implemented for old vehicles.
So all the above are correct.
